title: faster appservice interface for local processes
body: Currently using a UWP process with a full trust win32 process in order to provide access to a shared memory or local loopback.

comments.body: Are pipes acceptable for your use-case? You can create a pipe, dupe the handle, and send the handle value over to the other process. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/ipc/pipes
